name: Sheep Savior
description:
Sheep Savior is a game where you become a shepherd and must guide your lost sheep back home. Choose where your home is set, and rescue your sheep before they get eaten by the wolves living on the outside.

  • Use the terrain and your sheep themselves to your advantage!
  • Choose between mouse or keyboard controls to control the way you play!

By: Alexey Beall and Alvin Xu
